claims.claim: Account opening process takes 9 days on average, which is 3 times the industry average
claims.quote: That is a tall order when it takes nine days on average to open a new account, according to an internal audit reviewed by Business Insider, which is three times the industry average.

claims.claim: Citi Wealth has significantly lower wallet share compared to competitors (13% vs 64%)
claims.quote: The audit highlighted Citi Wealth's dismal 13% average wallet share compared to its peers' 64% average.

claims.claim: Technology overhaul would require at least $500 million investment
claims.quote: The audit, conducted by Ernst & Young, estimated it would take at least $500 million to overhaul Citi Wealth's patchwork technology, which includes 30 content platforms and more than 70 product processors.

claims.claim: Poor technology has direct negative impact on current and prospective clients
claims.quote: The result of Citi's burdensome technology, the report said, is 'a direct negative impact to our current and prospective clients.'

claims.claim: Technology problems make it difficult for clients to do business with Citi and disincentivize them from keeping their full portfolio with the bank
